If you're worried about your data cap, invest in a seedbox instead. I blew threw 320 GB over just a few days, but keep in mind I was uploading like 250 torrents over a few days and not your 10-15 each week lol.

thats no good.. been through that before

you have to upload conversions to the seedbox

isps count all data ftp.web,vpn etc so your still stuff with data limit.. to pay for $50 on top for seed box might as well buy more data from isp

but im not all of us have incomes or work
some of us have health issues and put ont he scrap

plus seedboxes have one ip and prime target

vpns are cheaper (some) and can have many to choose from and bouse about country to counry

always best to alternate ips per torrent seed now days
i guess your isp dont charge for uploads unlike here

@rr-ne ok,I see what your on about now.the eps. are right but the ep. numbers & titles are wrong.you'll notice your titles match up with the content of these eps. if you dl & watch them."sweet pawn of mine"= slash's ID & "the offer"= corry's job offer from another pawn shop.specials are hard to tag cuz one site will say they are part of new season,one will say last season & one will say new season but tag as ep00.confusing as hell to uploaders & downloaders alike

yeh I had thought that 2 episodes in the end of last season were part of these season and can see now
why 2 appear missing but we do have them all it seems as you say (above) easiest is just rename your episodes to match scene doing or move the other 2 from last season and push the numbers up
